frontmatter.title: Sterol regulatory element binding protein 1 couples mechanical cues and lipid metabolism
frontmatter.description: Sterol regulatory element binding proteins (SREBPs) are a family of transcription factors that regulate lipid biosynthesis and adipogenesis by controlling the expression of several enzymes required for cholesterol, fatty acid, triacylglycerol and phospholipid synthesis.
